content_excerpt:
Half a camel production <halfacamelproductions@gmail.com>
Working ticket link?
BoxOffice <boxoffice@brightonfringe.org>
22 April 2025 at 18:09
To: Half a camel production <halfacamelproductions@gmail.com>
Hi Ben,
Apologies, I think I'm getting myself confused!
The ticket part is all sorted, I just saw that there was mention of customers emailing directly with the venue to make bookings. I just wanted to
double check with you if this was the case and if you would like me to contact those customers directly to make sure their booking is
transferred, but if no bookings have been made that's all fine.
Many thanks,
Elin Eaton (she/her)
Box Office Manager
A: Office 4 at The Old Court House, 118 Church Street, Brighton, BN1 1UD 
P: 01273 91 72 72 
W: www.brightonfringe.org 
#BrightonFringe #BF20
